text: Extinct is a 2021 American-Chinese computer animated comic science fiction adventure movie directed by David Silverman and Raymond S. Persi and produced by Timeless Films, China Lion, Tolerable Entertainment, Huayi Brothers, Huayi Tencent Entertainment, HB Wink Animation and Cinesite and distributed by Lionsgate and in VOD on November 19, 2021. == Voice Cast == * Adam Devine as Ed * Rachel Bloom as Op * Zazie Beetz as Dottie * Jim Jefferies as Burnie * Catherine O'Hara as Alma * Reggie Watts as Hoss * Benedict Wong as Dr. Chung * Ken Jeong as Clarence * Nick Frost as Captain * Tom Hollander as Charles Darwin * Henry Winkler as Jepson * Richard Kind as Wally * Steve Aoki as Vinny * Alex Borstein as Mali Additional voices: Jon Lovitz, Sydney Malmberg Liu, Maria Bamford, Terry Gross, Tom Kenny, Jason Hightower as Narrator, David Silverman as Cyclops, Brenden Patrick Hill, Benedict Wong, Raymond S. Persi, Julia Chan as Mrs. Sun, Little girl. == Other websites == * Category:2021 comedy movies Category:2021 science fiction movies Category:American animated movies Category:English-language movies Category:Canadian animated movies Category:Canadian comedy movies Category:Canadian science fiction movies Category:Chinese movies Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Movies composed by Michael Giacchino
title: Extinct (2021 movie)
